mapper.insert: insert into pet_info (pet_id, user_id, pet_name, variety_id, pet_sex, pet_birthday, is_neutered, vaccine_status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{varietyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isNeutered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vaccineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update pet_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pet_name = #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, variety_id = #{varietyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pet_sex = #{petSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pet_birthday = #{petBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, is_neutered = #{isNeutered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vaccine_status = #{vaccineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pet_id, user_id, pet_name, variety_id, pet_sex, pet_birthday, is_neutered, vaccine_status, created_at, updated_at from pet_info where pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
